data.text: @rogerwilkinson3 Hi Roger, we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. To assist you further, kindly send us a DM. Thanks – Chichi
@native8550 Hi @native8550, I'm sorry to hear about the cancelled flight. Can you send us a DM to check it further for you? Thanks. -Kauri
@ayou7647 Hi Andrew, Having a cancelled flight is never a good feeling. Would you mind sending us a DM here? We'd love the chance to check this further for you. Thanks - Norine

@KelynnWolfe Hi Kelynn, I'm sorry to hear about the cancelled flight. We know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Vi

@Itzizzy29 Hi Isabella, we know how inconvenient cancelled/rescheduled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. If you need further assistance with a specific booking, you can send us a DM. Thanks - Chichi
@vvc80 Hi @vvc80, we do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. Hopefully, you’ll be on your way soon. Thanks– Jen

@Tiim_ Hi Timothy, I understand how upsetting it can be when travel plans change. If you require assistance with rebooking your flight/s or would like to explore alternative options, please send us a DM here. Thanks – Jen

@_animalibera_ Hi Beom Bo-Joo, we know travel might be a little tricky right now. At this point, your preferred flight isn't available until the 1st of April 2022. You may keep an eye on our website though as hopefully there'll be a flight that you can take advantage of soon. Thanks. -Kauri
@martinkrafft Hi Martin, sorry to hear you were unable to reach us. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to assist you here. Thanks – Leslie
@aliceinsteph Hi Ariel, I appreciate how frustrating this must be for you. Can you send us a DM of your booking details so we can take a further look into this? Thanks - Bree
@khairulnurafzal Hi Afzal, sorry to hear about what happened. Would you mind sending us a DM with more details? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Jen

@NatePano Hi Nate. I'm sorry if you weren’t updated with your flight. I know it doesn’t make up for the frustration experienced. If you need further assistance with your booking, you can send us a DM. Thanks - Chichi
@leeroystapes Hi Lee, I know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be. We’d love the chance to chat with you about this and see what we can do. Would you mind sending us a DM here? Thanks - Norine

data.text: @AlesVasenda Hi Ales, I'm sorry for any inconvenience this has caused you. We'd like to check this further for you. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? Thanks - Vi

@htj5 Hi Hatije, Sorry to hear you’re having trouble booking seats on our website. Our website is functioning normally at the moment so it may help if you clear the cache and cookies saved in your browser. Feel free to send us a DM here if an error still occurs. Thanks - Norine

@Mattunchained Hi Matt, I can appreciate why this must be upsetting for you. Could you please send us a DM here? We’d love the chance to chat with you about this and assist you further. Thanks - Norine

@Johnny_wants Hi Johnny, sorry to hear your flight was cancelled. It looks as though our communications system was still playing catch up – we apologise for any upset caused. If you require any assistance with your booking, please DM us and we’d be happy to help. Thanks – Vi

@coachmarkiewicz Hi Matt. I;m sorry to hear about your flight. We know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. If you need further assistance with your booking, you can send us a DM. Thanks. - Chichi

@Sam9Gaming Hi Sam, I'm sorry to hear about the canceled flight. We know how inconvenient canceled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking number so we can look into further for you? Thanks. – Kauri

@TimOnTwtr I appreciate your frustration on this, Tim. I'm taking note of your feedback about the app. In the meantime, try using our website check-ins through our Manage Booking. You may also try redownloading the Jetstar app it still doesn't work on your end. Thanks - Bree

@TimOnTwtr Hey Tim. Sorry to hear you’re having trouble accessing our website. It may help if you clear the cache and cookies saved in your browser. If it still won't work, kindly send us a DM. Thanks – Chichi
@TimOnTwtr Hi Tim, I appreciate you're having difficulty trying to check in on the Jetstar app. You may also try doing it online through Manage Booking here: https://t.co/L7uAle7bS4. Thanks - Bree
@jpcrowleymt Hi JP, I appreciate how upsetting it is to wait in a queue for that long. Thanks for your feedback on this. - Bree
@littlestepky Hi Kylie. I understand your situation. To check this further for you, please send us a DM. Thanks - Chichi
@viclouplum Hi Viktorija. I understand your situation. To assist you further, please send us a DM. Thanks - Chichi

@ZML05598328 Hi there, I'm sorry to hear about your delayed flight and the inconvenience it has caused you. Could you send us a DM of your booking details so we can assist you further on this? Thanks - Bree
@ColJCSmith Hi, @ColJCSmith. Thanks for reaching out and sorry to hear that your flight was cancelled, we'd like to look into this for you. Please send us a Direct Message. Thanks - Dan

@VeronicaMoreho5 Hey Veronica, there’s nothing we like more than hearing that one of our passengers has had a great flight experience. Thanks for letting us know! We’ll definitely pass this to the team, they’ll be stoked to hear it. - Jay

urls.title: Travel Alerts | Jetstar
urls.description: Chat with one of our friendly Jetstar customer service

data.text: @ihadabeer_ Hi there, we recommend that you check with the relevant government authority (both origin and destination) to confirm what specific requirements are needed prior to travelling. You can also check our travel alerts page for more info - https://t.co/XnVhJxXMdw Thanks - Leslie

@Reece_9877 Hi @Reece_9877. Thanks for reaching out, I’m sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused you and we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? Thanks - Dan

@suedav1 Hi there. Sorry to hear you’re having trouble allocating your seat online. It may help if you clear the cache and cookies saved in your browser. Or would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Vi

urls.title: Contact us: Lost, damaged and delayed baggage | Jetstar
urls.description: Has your baggage been lost, damaged or delayed? Find out more information on what you need to do before leaving the airport and how you can make a claim.

data.text: @rustedon1962 Hi Tony, I understand how serious and upsetting this situation must be for you. Our baggage team are best placed to assist with this! For more info and speak with them directly, visit https://t.co/irdPUOt9Zo. Thanks - Jaya
@MoeSwag2 Hi Boujee, would you mind sending us a DM with more details? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further and assist. Thanks – Jay

data.text: @AlesVasenda Hi Ales, I'm sorry to hear about this. Can you send us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Chichi

@gotatts @gotatts Hi there. I'm sorry to hear that you haven't received your voucher yet. Would you mind sending us a DM with more details? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Jay

@felft We’d like to look into this for you, Felft – as we’re usually really proud of the experience we provide our customers. Could you please send us a DM here and tell us more about your concerns? We’d love the chance to chat with you about this and see what we can do. Thanks - Norine
@BeCee Hi Brendan, so glad to hear you had a great experience with our service team. Cheers! - Bree
@robseltz Hi Robert, I understand how upsetting it can be when travel plans change. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Jaya

urls.title: Contact us: Lost, damaged and delayed baggage | Jetstar
urls.description: Has your baggage been lost, damaged or delayed? Find out more information on what you need to do before leaving the airport and how you can make a claim.

data.text: @elveeeeeeeeee Hi @elveeeeeeeeee. Thanks for reaching out, sorry to hear that the phone was left. Our baggage team are best placed to assist with this, for more info and speak with them directly visit - https://t.co/6zamkVdTPZ. Thanks - Dan

@_swapnesh Hi there, I appreciate how inconvenient it is when flights get changed. Could you send us a DM of your booking reference and full name so we can look into the options for you? Thanks - Bree
@MelissaCarlso20 That doesn’t sound like the sort of experience we want any of our customers to have, Melissa. Would you mind sending us a DM so we can look into it further?  Thanks - Jaya
@elliemcca Hi Elaine, sorry for the inconvenience this has caused you. We’d love the chance to chat with you and see what we can do. Could you please send us a DM? - Jaya
@kojamoz Hi there. I'm sorry for any inconvenience the flight cancellation may have caused you. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Vi
@IsraelSegall Hi @IsraelSegall. Sorry to hear that you cannot travel, we’d love the chance to chat to you about this and see what we can do. Could you please DM us? Thanks - Dan
@brooksieg Hi there, sorry to hear about your experience. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Jaya
@sumantagw Hi there. I'm sorry to hear about your experience. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Vi

@rebeccajpowell We’d like to look into this for you, Rebecca – as we’re usually really proud of the experience we provide our customers. Can you send us a DM and provide your booking number? Thanks. – Kauri

@byshbopy Hi Byshbopy, I'm sorry to hear about what happened. We’re usually very proud of the customer service our team delivers, so we’d like to look into this further. If you require further assistance, you can send us a DM. Thanks.  –Kauri
@misspaige1311 Hi Sarah,  I’m sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused you. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Jaya

@dnatimelord Hi Jeremy. I'm sorry to hear you got bumped from your pre-purchased seat on your last flight. The turnaround time for our refund is within 15 business days. If you still require further assistance, you can send us a DM. Thanks. -Kauri

@YOnosoyLuisa Hi YonosoyLuisa, we do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. Hopefully, you’ll be on your way soon. If you require assistance with re-booking your flight/s or would like to explore alternative options, you can send us a DM. Thanks. -Kauri
@coachbear Hi Mikey, we’d love the chance to chat with you about this and see how we can help. Could you send us a DM so we can look into things? Thanks – Kauri
@edmund59 Hi Edmund, I'm sorry to hear about your brother's cancelled flight. If you need further assistance with his booking, please feel free to send us a DM so we can assist you. Thanks - Bree
@tpmoloney If you need to discuss about a specific booking, you may send us a DM for assistance. Thanks - Jay 2/2

@tpmoloney Hi Tim. I appreciate your unhappy with excess carry on fees. Our carry-on restrictions are 7kgs in total for each passenger – with the option to purchase an extra 7kgs if they need to bring a little more onboard. 1/2
@catherine_leam Hi Cathie, I can appreciate why this is upsetting for you. Would you mind sending us a DM here? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Norine
@piecesofpi That’s the kind of feedback we love to hear, Sheila – and we’re sure the team will love to hear it too. We’ll pass it on! – Jaya
@piecesofpi Hi Sheila, I understand your situation. We’d like to take another look at this and see what we can do. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? - Jaya

@MsMelM Hi Melanie, sorry to hear about their cancelled flight. We know how inconvenient it can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’ll see what we can do to get them to their destination. –  Jaya

@TamikaRawson Hi Tamika, sorry to hear that you're unable to take your upcoming flight. We’d love the chance to chat with you about this and see what we can do. Could you please send us a DM? Thanks - Leslie

@AnnieH1cks Hey Annie, There’s nothing we like more than hearing that one of our passengers has had a great flight experience. Thanks for letting us know! We’ll definitely pass this on to the team, they’ll be stoked to hear it. - Jaya
@fantashtic12 That doesn’t sound like the sort of experience we want any of our customers to have, Tash. Would you mind sending us a DM with more details so we can look into it further? Thanks - Jay

urls.title: Contact Us | Jetstar Holidays
urls.description: Visit our customer service page to get in touch via email, call or request a callback.

data.text: @JafferyNoman Hi Noman, sorry to hear that your holiday was cancelled. Our holidays team are best placed to assist with this, for more info and speak with them directly, visit https://t.co/17ELJf9GsV. Thanks - Dan
@lux_senthil Hi @lux_senthil. I appreciate that you’re upset, would you mind sending us a DM? We’d love the chance to chat to you about this and see what we can do. Thanks – Dan

@0504Traveller Hi there! We are currently working with relevant Authorities on the travel requirements we need to operate on that destinations again and will update customers as soon as possible. You can keep an eye on our website for more updates here: https://t.co/OMN2YCPp5E. -  Jaya

@hellsbellsbeach Hi @hellsbellsbeach, the use of masks is mandatory on all flights and in all airports across Australia. We have escalated your concerns to management to follow up with our relevant teams to ensure team members are adhering to the correct requirements at all times. Thanks – Jeff

data.text: @olivia_bourke Hi Olivia. You can find the most up to date info on the requirements for travelling domestically within Australia here https://t.co/K3ZWq1tvhn. If you need further assistance with a certain booking, feel free to DM us so we can look for options and assist. - Jen
@PlanBNFT Hi PlanBNFT, sorry for any inconvenience this has caused you. Could you please send us a DM so we can look for options and assist? Thanks- Jen

@Kimmiar Hi Kimberley, I know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be and we try to avoid doing this as much as we can but sometimes, things are out of our hands. Could you please send us a DM here? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Norine
@bcubzz Hi Bianca, sorry to hear you still haven't received your credit voucher. Could you please send us a DM here? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Norine

@Minhal512 Hi Minhal, sorry to hear about your cancelled flight. We know how inconvenient it can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks –  Jaya

@div_s_p Hi Div, That’s not the standard we set for our aircrafts – thanks for letting us know. Please let us know the flight number and we will pass the feedback on to the cleaners. If you need further assistance, feel free to send us a DM here. - Norine

@alfaspider Hi there! We apprecaite your feedback and we’ll pass it on to the team – in the meantime, you might want to keep an eye on our website page - https://t.co/drScIY5YBe for updates. Thanks – Jaya
@samjayne74 Hi Fitzy, sorry for the long wait. We’d love to look into this for you. Could you please send us a DM here so we can assist further? Thanks - Norine

urls.title: COVID-related flight changes and cancellations | Jetstar
urls.description: With travel restrictions changing regularly due to COVID-19, you may need to change your travel plans. Check your options for flexible flying here.

data.text: @wickytweetz Hi Wicky. Thanks for reaching out. As part of our Fly Flexible campaign, customers with valid bookings will be able to make one date/time change without paying a change fee and only fare difference will apply. For details you may visit here: https://t.co/wvaj7UmtHE. - Jay

@roblayfield Hi Robert. I'm sorry to hear that you're unable to contact us. We don’t have a direct email address. If you’d like to make a complaint, you can call us at 131 538 or you can send us a DM here and we’ll help you out. Thanks - Vi
@dkornfeld Hi there. I'm sorry to hear about the emails that you received. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Vi
@Backflip25 Hey Bryan! Thanks for the wonderful Christmas message. We wish you a Merry Christmas too. Cheers! - Chichi

@doolakk Hi Mark, sorry to hear about this. We know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be especially during the holiday season. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’ll see what we can do to get you on your way. Thanks – Chichi

data.text: @MichaelFenech1 Thanks for getting back to us Michael. If no PCR requirements are needed within the government guidelines, it would not be required by us. We ask that you check this directly with the appropriate government authority prior to travel, as requirements change over time. Thanks - Dan

urls.title: Prepare to fly domestic | Jetstar
urls.description: Prepare for your next domestic flight with helpful resources, including a handy checklist, requirement search tool and check in information.

data.text: @MichaelFenech1 Hi Michael, thanks for reaching out. You can find the most up to date info on travelling domestically within Australia on our website - https://t.co/h5SoehDxiA. We always recommend that you check government travel restrictions prior to booking and travelling too. Thanks – Dan

@SuePhoAu Hi Susan, sorry to hear about your cancelled flight. We know how inconvenient it can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Jaya
